<article class="doc-row" id="ex-multiple">

### Single/Multiple Selection

<div class="row">

<div class="col-md-6">

#### Single Option Select

```html
<v-select :options="countries"></v-select>
```

</div>

<div class="col-md-6">

#### Multiple Option Select

```html
<v-select multiple :options="countries"></v-select>
```

</div>

</div>

</article>
